title: spack spec is slow
body:
```
$ time spack spec py-jupyter-notebook %gcc@5.4.0

--------------------------------

--------------------------------

            ^py-pygments
            ^py-simplegeneric

            ^py-jupyter-core

                    ^py-decorator
                    ^py-enum34
                    ^py-ipython-genutils
            ^py-zmq@13:

                    ^py-pycparser
                ^py-cython@0.16:

                    ^libsodium

                ^py-six@1.9.0:

    ^py-jupyter-console
        ^py-prompt-toolkit@1.0.0:1.999.999
            ^py-wcwidth
    ^py-nbconvert

            ^py-pip
        ^py-mistune
        ^py-nbformat
            ^py-jsonschema
                ^py-functools32
                ^py-vcversioner
        ^py-pycurl
            ^curl@7.19.0:
```
